generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by curbs and adjacent to buildings.
- building: Modern buildings are visible on the right side of the road, including one with a glass facade.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and green hedges are present along the sides of the road and in the background.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible through the tree canopy, appearing as a light blue area.
- car: Two white vans are visible on the road, and a black car is parked on the right side.
- traffic sign: A triangular traffic sign with a red border and a white background is visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and streetlights.
- terrain: Some patches of grass are visible along the roadside, particularly on the left side.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
